Class HostScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Scene
      • gui.HostScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class HostScene
extends javafx.scene.Scene
    The active session scene for voting and changing what the clients see
    Author:
    Nic / Josh
